title: Brideshead revisited. Episode 01
subject_group: Literature/English literature - Film and video adaptations
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television
description: It is dawn on a cold winter's morning in 1943. Charles Ryder, painter turned army captain, in the twilight of WWII has marched most of the night and camped with his platoon at their secret destination. On waking, he is amazed to find he is at the rear of Brideshead Castle where he spent many years of enchantment and grief in his youth, and which, years ago he had left vowing never to return. Now here he was, cold and with memories flooding over him like storm-surf on the shore. He was back. Brideshead revisited had begun! Stars Jeremy Irons. Rated: PG
